projects.title: Mars Kitchen
projects.description: Commercial VR title shipped on Meta Quest Store and PlayStation Store (PlayStation 5 support). Owned quest/dialogue systems, AI-driven customer simulation, and a multi-lightset baking workflow for instant scene transitions. Implemented hand-tracking rhythm mode (Meta Start Dev Competition finalist). Contributed to VR polish and platform release engineering.
highlights: Quest + dialogue systems: designer-friendly authoring, conditional branching, runtime state management
AI simulation: customer behavior state machine, goal-driven interactions, tunable parameters
Multi-lightset baking pipeline: instant scene transitions without runtime overhead
Hand-tracking rhythm mode: custom gesture recognition + scoring (Meta Start Dev Competition)
VR polish + platform support: performance optimization (Quest 2/Pro), PlayStation 5 release engineering

projects.title: Polyverse
projects.description: WebGL multiplayer game (Unity). Owned 3C (character/camera/controls), combat system, and UI/tutorial flows end-to-end. Integrated blockchain wallet (MetaMask) for NFT authentication. Implemented deterministic A* pathfinding for server-authoritative enemy movement.
highlights: 3C ownership: character controller (physics-based movement), camera system (dynamic framing), input handling (keyboard + gamepad)
Combat system: attack states, hit detection, damage calculation, enemy AI behaviors
UI + tutorial: first-time user flow, onboarding sequence, HUD + menus
Deterministic A* pathfinding: server-side enemy movement with client prediction
Blockchain integration: MetaMask wallet connection, NFT ownership verification

projects.title: Acryptia
projects.description: Authoritative-server card game (Unity + Mirror networking). Owned core gameplay loop, UI implementation, and three major systems: Game Pass (progression rewards), inventory (card collection management), and equipment (loadout customization). Implemented seeded deck randomization (server-authoritative), monsters with special effects (on-play triggers, conditional logic), and NFT game skins with real gameplay utility (stat modifiers, ability unlocks).
highlights: Authoritative server architecture: Mirror networking, server-side game logic, client prediction + reconciliation
Core loop + UI: match flow state machine, card play validation, visual feedback, animations
Game Pass system: progression tracking, reward unlocks, UI integration
Inventory + equipment: card collection management, loadout system, stat calculations
Gameplay content: monster special effects (trigger system, conditional logic), NFT skins with gameplay impact (stat modifiers, ability unlocks)
